description: seascape with hill/land mass at center and left; beach and water at right; sketchy figures sitting on beach in LRC; standing figure on shoreline beyond seated figures; green, tan, grey and blue
markings: on backing paper: E. B. Crocker Art Gallery exhibition label and Santa Barbara Museum of Art loan label
provenance: [Colnaghi, London, until 1973; sold August 3 for Â£225, to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1973-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: at bottom center, in brown ink: [Grotto antica di Tiberio a Sperlonga]
title: Grotto of Tiberius at Sperlonga
